channel.title: CVE Feed for denosaurs -- emoji
channel.description: The latest CVEs for denosaurs -- emoji

item.title: CVE-2023-30858|2024-08-02T14:37:15.495Z -- denosaurs -- emoji
item.description: The Denosaurs emoji package provides emojis for dinosaurs. Starting in version 0.1.0 and prior to version 0.3.0, the reTrimSpace regex has 2nd degree polynomial inefficiency, leading to a delayed response given a big payload. The issue has been patched in 0.3.0. As a workaround, avoid using the `replace`, `unemojify`, or `strip` functions.
